trans-unit.source: Provides a strongly typed collection of <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.ProcessModule" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: 提供 <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.ProcessModule" /> 物件的強型別集合。

trans-unit.source: A module is an executable file or a dynamic link library (DLL).
trans-unit.target: 模組是可執行檔或動態連結程式庫 (DLL)。

trans-unit.source: Each process consists of one or more modules.
trans-unit.target: 每個處理序是由一個或多個模組所組成。

trans-unit.source: You can use this class to iterate over a collection of process modules on the system.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這個類別來反覆查看集合的系統上的處理序模組。

trans-unit.source: A module is identified by its module name and fully qualified file path.
trans-unit.target: 模組的識別是由其模組名稱和完整的檔案路徑。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.ProcessModuleCollection" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.ProcessModuleCollection" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.ProcessModuleCollection" /> class, with no associated <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.ProcessModule" /> instances.
trans-unit.target: 不使用關聯的 <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.ProcessModule" /> 執行個體，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.ProcessModuleCollection" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: An array of <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.ProcessModule" /> instances with which to initialize this <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.ProcessModuleCollection" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.ProcessModule" /> 執行個體的陣列，用來初始化這個 <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.ProcessModuleCollection" /> 執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.ProcessModuleCollection" /> class, using the specified array of <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.ProcessModule" /> instances.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.ProcessModule" /> 執行個體陣列，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.ProcessModuleCollection" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.ProcessModule" /> instance that indicates the module to find in this collection.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.ProcessModule" /> 執行個體，表示要在此集合中尋找的模組。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified process module exists in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 判斷指定的處理序模組是否存在於集合中。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the module exists in the collection; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果模組存在於集合中，則為 <see langword="true" />；否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: A module is identified by its module name and its fully qualified file path.
trans-unit.target: 模組是以其模組名稱和識別其完整的檔案路徑。

trans-unit.source: An array of <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.ProcessModule" /> instances to add to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 要加入集合的 <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.ProcessModule" /> 執行個體陣列。

trans-unit.source: The location at which to add the new instances.
trans-unit.target: 要加入新執行個體的所在位置。

trans-unit.source: Copies an array of <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.ProcessModule" /> instances to the collection, at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 從指定索引處開始，將 <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.ProcessModule" /> 執行個體的陣列複製到集合。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.ProcessModule" /> whose index is retrieved.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.ProcessModule" />，其索引已獲擷取。

trans-unit.source: Provides the location of a specified module within the collection.
trans-unit.target: 提供集合內指定模組的位置。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index that defines the location of the module within the <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.ProcessModuleCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: 以零為起始的索引定義 <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.ProcessModuleCollection" /> 內的模組位置。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index value of the module in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 此集合中模組之以零起始的索引值。

trans-unit.source: Gets an index for iterating over the set of process modules.
trans-unit.target: 取得索引，用於逐一查看這組處理序模組。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.ProcessModule" /> that indexes the modules in the collection
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.ProcessModule" />，會對集合中的模組建立索引
